name: @apigear-io-templates/python-blueprint
description: A python blueprint with support for http and wamp.

scripts.gen:goldenmaster: rm -rf goldenmaster && node node_modules/@apigear-io/objectapi-cli/bin/apigear-gen --rules rules.yaml --force --sources apis/testbed.module.yaml --features all --output test && mv test/ goldenmaster
scripts.test:goldenmaster: rm -rf test && node node_modules/@apigear-io/objectapi-cli/bin/apigear-gen --rules rules.yaml --force --sources apis/testbed.module.yaml --features all --output test && diff -r goldenmaster/ test/
